name: Anvil Valkyrie
description:
Manufacturer: Anvil Aerospace 
Focus: Military / Industrial
The Valkyrie ups the ante on troop transport. Designed to safely deliver and extract up to twenty soldiers, as well as vehicles, the most hostile locations. This conflict-ready mil-spec craft is a formidable force, both offensively and defensively. Built with military, militia, and private defense contractors in mind, the Valkyrie is the most efficient and effective personnel transport in its class.
description_cn:
制造商：铁砧航天(Anvil Aerospace) 
定位：军用 / 工业
女武神提高了士兵运输的水准。女武神被设计成可以在最危险的区域安全投放或撤离最多20名士兵和数辆载具。得益于它的军用规格组件，女武神无论在进攻还是防守上都是一个强大的力量。女武神的客户定位为军队，民兵组织以及私人安保集团，它拥有同级别效率最高且最有用的人员运输能力。

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-弧光星(ArcCorp)-18区(Area18)-阿斯特罗无畏舰队
